title: Sweet and sour chicken
description: This is exactly like your favourite sweet and sour from the local down the road, but with fewer calories. Proves that a diet doesn’t have to be all about denial.This meal without rice provides 288 kcal, 20g protein, 38g carbohydrate (of which 29g sugars), 7g fat (of which 1g saturates), 3g fibre and 0.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 x 425g/15oz can pineapple chunks in natural juice
2 peppers, red, green, orange or yellow, deseeded and cut into chunks of about 3cm/1¼in
25g/1oz piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely grated
